data.name: XComboBox
desc: gives access to the items of a combo box and makes it possible to register item and action event listeners.

methods.name: addActionListener
desc: registers a listener for action events.

methods.name: addItem
desc: adds an item at the specified position.

methods.name: addItemListener
desc: registers a listener for item events.

methods.name: addItems
desc: adds multiple items at the specified position.

methods.name: getDropDownLineCount
desc: returns the number of visible lines in the drop down mode.

methods.name: getItem
desc: returns the item at the specified position.

methods.name: getItemCount
desc: returns the number of items in the combo box.

methods.name: getItems
desc: returns all items of the combo box.

methods.name: removeActionListener
desc: unregisters a listener for action events.

methods.name: removeItemListener
desc: unregisters a listener for item events.

methods.name: removeItems
desc: removes a number of items at the specified position.

methods.name: setDropDownLineCount
desc: sets the number of visible lines for drop down mode.
